thread.title: Nice friendly hotel on a quiet street
thread.title_full: Nice friendly hotel on a quiet street - Review of Hotel Diocleziano, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: harps182014
title: Nice friendly hotel on a quiet street
text: I stayed at this hotel on a family holiday to Rome at the beginning of March. The hotel is located on a quiet side street about five minutes walk from the main train station - great location for getting the train to and from the airport however it is a little out of the center. The staff were extremely friendly and helpful, always willing to answer any questions and give great recommendations. There were a variety of options for breakfast, I personally really enjoyed the freshly squeezed orange juice every morning. The room itself was clean but pretty basic however it did the job for a short city break. Overall we enjoyed our stay here but if you are looking to walk to the main attractions such as the Colosseum it is around a 30 minute walk.
